title: 1 x Granny's SOAP FLAKES Original Fragrance Free 425g Bag No Allergens No Bleach
features: PACKAGE: 1 X Resealable natural fragrance free, vegan friendly soap flakes, 425gms
KIND TO SKIN & FABRICS: Granny's Natural Soap Flakes, free from fragrance, bleach, enzymes, optical brighteners and allergens. Made from gentle vegetable soap flakes with strong cleaning power.
DELICATE FABRIC CLEANER: Perfect for washing delicate fabrics, such as wool, silk, linen and waterproof outdoor clothing.
GENERAL HOME CLEANING: These flakes are great for woolen or other fibre carpets and rugs, gently clean china, marble, vinyl and wood surfaces.

DIRECTIONS FOR USE: Suitable for handwashing clothing, dissolve flakes in hot water following the on pack dosage table. Add to washing machines following the on pack table. General cleaning, dissolve flakes in hot water, clean surfaces as required
description: Product Description Granny's Natural Soap Flakes, free from fragrance, bleach, enzymes, optical brightners and allergens. Made from gentle vegetable soap flakes with strong cleaning power. Perfect for washing delicate fabrics, such as wool, silk, linen and waterproof outdoor clothing. Use for general cleaning, shampoo woollen or other fibre carpets and rugs, gently clean china, marble,vinyl and wood surfaces. Suitable for handwashing clothing, dissolve flakes in hot water following the on pack dosage table. Add to washing machines following the on pack table. General cleaning, dissolve 75gms soap flakes in hot water, clean surfaces as required. Resealable natural fragrance free, vegan friendly soap flakes, 425gms Ingredients Soap
